unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, swears by Ayurveda! Every year, she goes to the Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala in Kerala for a panchakarma treatment. She says it resets her whole system. This Onam, she even made us all try her special Ayurvedic biryani – healthier than regular biryani but surprisingly delicious! I’m thinking of trying a shorter session myself, maybe near Pune. It’s worth exploring beyond just popping pills, right? Amma's been doing this for 20+ years and still walks 5 km a day!
